channel.title: Need a code
channel.description:
need a code called (pk) and the coords are 2987 9636 please make me a code of it asap. with no if teleblocked
Thanks

item.title: Need a code
item.dc:creator: @xx_robie_xx xx robie xx
item.description:
@xx_robie_xx wrote:

im using medieval project source and client [quote=“veikron, post:7, topic:225984”]wow man u dont get the point im not saying copy off forums im saying like this… you have some commands like this

[b]} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by veikron } else { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 2801; sendMessage( "You teleport to the Training Area!"); }[/b] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hardtrain")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by veikron } else { teleportToX = 2863; teleportToY = 9565; sendMessage( "You teleport to the hard training! Warning this is hard..");

the part in bold copy it press enter then press paste so it looks like this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by veikron } else { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 2801; sendMessage( "You teleport to the Training Area!"); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by veikron } else { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 2801; sendMessage( "You teleport to the Training Area!"); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hardtrain")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by veikron } else { teleportToX = 2863; teleportToY = 9565; sendMessage( "You teleport to the hard training! Warning this is hard..");

so theres 2 trains you see then you change the 2nd tain to the name cords and dialouge you want[/quote]

im using medieval project source and client and when i post that it gives me error saying somethin about teleblocked…that why i want a simple tele command

Read full topic

item.title: Need a code
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

Okay, one, I understand what you’re getting at, two, I didn’t mean it like that, and three, I only typed a basic code, not some long one like you did. I don’t think you’d need all that just to teleport somewhere unless you want the Gfx. A good, basic teleport command will work. Or unless you wanna add it to where it requires items or deletes item’s after you teleport then sure…

Read full topic

item.title: Need a code
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

Yes but you don’t exactly learn how to make a command yourself unless you go and study it for a bit. To better yourself, you must do it yourself, not take other people’s plagiarized work and say, “Oh ya! I made my first command!” Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a code
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

What kind of code exactly? A teleporting command?

EDIT:

If you mean a teleport command, here it is:

If (command.startsWith"pk") { teleportToX = 2987; teleportToY = 9636; sendMessage(" You've just teleported to the Pk area!"); }

Read full topic
